```{r}
install.packages("xtable")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
anscombe
```

```{r}
ansc <-
  bind_cols(
  anscombe %>% 
    select(matches("x")) %>% 
    gather(dataset, "x"),
  anscombe %>%
    select(matches("y")) %>% 
    gather(key, "y")
) %>% 
select(-key) %>% 
  mutate(dataset=gsub("x", "", dataset)) %>% 
  as_tibble()
```
```{r}
ansc
```

```{r}
ansc %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>% 
  summarize(
    mean_x = mean(x),
    stdev_x = sd(x),
    mean_y = mean(sd), 
    stdev_y = sd(y)
  )
```
